snippet: Rafael Nadal lost to David Ferrer in the quarterfinals of the Monte Carlo Masters on Friday, his earliest exit since 2003 at a tournament that helped build his reputation as one of the greatest clay-court players.
abstract: David Ferrer beats Rafael Nadal in quarterfinals of the Monte Carlo Masters.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal lost to David Ferrer in the quarterfinals of the Monte Carlo Masters on Friday, his earliest exit since 2003 at a tournament that helped build his reputation as one of the greatest clay-court players.

headline.main: Nadal Loses to Ferrer on Clay
headline.print_headline: Nadal Loses to Ferrer on Clay
